Room.Name: Hafnia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Hafnia Way, just east of a noisy encampment.
Room.LongDescription: Several large and colorful tents are to the east, and bright banners, flags and pennants fly above them. There are a couple hundred people there, and many camels and horses. The Oceancrest merchants are putting together a caravan to take supplies to surrounding cities. They hope to return with a handsome profit, and perhaps some exotic goods they can sell here for even more gold. They're a greedy bunch.
